DESCRIPTION:
Deep beneath the ruins of post-apocalyptic Moscow, in the crumbling Metro tunnels, the remnants of
humanity struggle to survive. Hordes of mutants storm last refuge of survivors. But rather than
unite, the Metro is divided into warring factions that fought each other for control of the underground.
Under the ground started this civil war that could wipe humanity from the face of the earth.
